item.title: RPG Game
item.dc:creator: @Procedural Procedural
item.description:
@Procedural wrote:

[quote=“Tekk, post:11, topic:349785”][quote author=super_ link=topic=446158.msg3276464#msg3276464 date=1279566505]
rpg games will never be the same
[/quote]

role playing game games will never be the same[/quote]

I hate when people say that -.-

Read full topic

item.title: RPG Game
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Tekk, post:49, topic:349785”][quote author=Tekk link=topic=446158.msg3277073#msg3277073 date=1279599724]

rpg games will never be the same

role playing game games will never be the same
[/quote]

Role Playing Game Game?

Thank god I’m not the only one who noticed that…

I propose a new genre of game: the role-playing game game. The premise of the game is to play a role-playing game. If you complete the role-playing game, you win the role-playing game game. However, if you lose the role-playing game, the game-playing role will play the game and the role of the game will become itself a game of playing-role games. Obviously, this can only lead to a role-playing game game game. In this way the universe is created.[/quote]

I think you’ve discovered the secret to creating a religion! Just make up lies about how the universe is created and you will instantly command the attention of millions.

Read full topic

Role Playing Game Game?
[/quote]

Thank god I’m not the only one who noticed that…[/quote]

I propose a new genre of game: the role-playing game game. The premise of the game is to play a role-playing game. If you complete the role-playing game, you win the role-playing game game. However, if you lose the role-playing game, the game-playing role will play the game and the role of the game will become itself a game of playing-role games. Obviously, this can only lead to a role-playing game game game. In this way the universe is created.

Read full topic

Frankly, you can start a game off a fucking helloworld using it as an inspiration, you cock.

Dude seriously, your not to brilliant. Hello world ‘applications’, if you call it that, are done with like, printing into the CMD, using a label, or some basic snippet size code, that cannot be developed into a game.

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:30, topic:349785”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=446158.msg3281693#msg3281693 date=1279923826]
It is progress though, as all things start somewhere.
[/quote]
Writing a hello world can be considered “progress”, doesn’t mean you need to release three fucking versions of it.[/quote]
Writing a hello world “program” is not worth it in any language. Making stuff like this is actual development towards something that has the potential to become something great, if done right.
